label: 次官
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: (characters vary) The vice-director, or second-level manager, of any ritsuryō agency.↓[HW: Characters and apellations varｙ according to office or agency:  ＜副（すけ）＞for 神祇官、＜大納言･中納言＞ for 太政官、＜輔（すけ）＞for 省、＜佐（すけ）＞for 衛門府･兵衛府、＜介（すけ）＞for 国司]
